title: Arbor Snowboards :: Product Profiles - Steepwater
description:
A collaboration with Steve Klassen, 5x winner of the Verbier Extreme and owner Wave Rave Snowboard Shop in Mammoth. Steve’s 20 years of R&D experience helped us create a rocket built for performance at speed and through variable, big mountain terrain. Expect Ferrari like acceleration and control.
To learn more about the Steepwater visit: arborcollective.com/snowboards/products/steepwater/
tags: Arbor,Arbor Snowboards,Product Profiles,Snowboarding,Product Video,Steepwater,Steve Klassen,Wave Rave,Verbier Xtreme
